description.value: Collect metrics form different server type. In particular: - Apache server status page and parses out the results into the repository - Web Server - Database - eSysAdm Server - FLUME collector - Redis Server

property.label: Monitor Type
property.description: Type of montor

property.label: Database Type
property.description: The type of database server this monitor is connecting to

property.label: Oracle version
property.description: Oracle version

property.label: Server Port
property.description: Port to use on the Server

property.label: Database Name
property.description: Name of the database to connect to on the sql server

property.label: Oracle Database Type
property.description: Oracle connection type (SID, Sevice)

property.label: Has DB2Schema
property.description: Specify a different Schema for use with the connection.

property.label: Schema Value
property.description: The schema to use when connecting to the DB2 instance.

property.label: SQLServer uses Windows Logon
property.description: If checked, the program will use windows single sign-on

property.label: Database Username
property.description: Username to use for login to the database

property.label: Database Password
property.description: Password for the username used to connect to the sql database

property.label: Database Connection URL
property.description: The URL to use to connect to the databse, instead of dynamically constructing the URL from the database, server, port, etc. {0} will be replaced with database host {1} will be replaced with database port {2} will be replaced with database name {3} will be replaced with database username {4} will be replaced with database password

property.label: Query Timeout
property.description: The query timeout, in seconds. 0 to have no timeout

property.label: Execute test SQL
property.description: If true execute test SQL

property.label: Query Statement
property.description: SQL Statement to execute on the SQL database. The returned rows of this statement will be used for the monitor.

property.label: Capture Mode
property.description: Select how data format returned by the query. Single values -> collect only the first value Metrics on columns -> collect selectes metrics form columns Metric on rows -> every row is a metric in the format group, metric, value

property.label: Result column
property.description: The name of the column to use to get the result. Empty means 1st column.

property.label: Splitting Name
property.description: A splitting group name

property.label: Column(s)
property.description: The name of the columns you wish to capture (one per line). Leave empty to collect all the columns.

property.label: Custsomize HTTP client
property.description: Configure HTTP client settings

property.label: Disable certificate validation
property.description: Enable to allow connections via SSL even if the certificate on the target host is invalid or self-signed.

property.label: User-Agent
property.description: The user agent string identifies the HTTP client and is sent with every request.

property.label: Server authorization
property.description: If the URL specified requires a name and password for access, server authorization needs to be enabled.

property.label: Server username
property.description: The username that is used for authorization with the server.

property.label: Server password
property.description: The password for the username.

property.label: Max. redirects
property.description: If a value of 1 or greater is specified, the URL Monitor will follow HTTP redirect codes (301-303, 307) to retrieve the webpage.

property.label: Use custom timeout
property.description: If enabled allows configuration of HTTP timeout.

property.label: Socket Timeout
property.description: The default socket timeout in milliseconds which is the timeout for waiting for data. A timeout value of zero is interpreted as an infinite timeout.

property.label: Connection Timeout
property.description: The timeout until a connection is established. A value of zero means the timeout is not used.

property.label: Connection RequestTimeout
property.description: The timeout until a connection request is received. A value of zero means the timeout is not used.

property.label: Use proxy
property.description: If enabled, the configured HTTP proxy server will be used to access the URL.

property.label: Proxy host
property.description: The hostname of the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy port
property.description: The port of the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy authorization
property.description: If the HTTP proxy server requires a username and a password for access, proxy authorization needs to be enabled.

property.label: Proxy username
property.description: The username that is used for authorization with the HTTP proxy server.

property.label: Proxy password
property.description: The password for the proxy username.

property.label: force Virtual Host
property.description: Force an HTTP Host: header. Use this in special cases (e.g. a load-balancer) when servername is not the virtual host configured in the WebServer

property.label: Virtual Host
property.description: Virtual host

property.label: dynaTrace Tagging
property.description: Enable dynaTrace tagging.

property.label: timer name
property.description: Identify this webrequest through a unique timer name. The timer name will be sent with each web request as a dynaTrace header field value.

property.label: eSysAdm namespace
property.description: Namespace to collect

property.label: metric aggregation
property.description: Aggregation to be used in collection

property.label: metric aggregation for splittings
property.description: Aggregation to be used in collection of splittings

property.label: Check server probe
property.description: Enable to check a URL to validate the server

property.label: Probe URL
property.description: Enter the URL to the webpage to be monitored. {host} will be replaced with target host. Example: https://{host}:8443/index.html

property.label: Method
property.description: Specify the type of the HTTP request. GET: retrieve the page content, HEAD: retrieve HTTP headers only, POST: send data with the request and retrive the page content (e.g. used for HTML forms)

property.label: POST Data
property.description: The data which will be sent with the POST request.

property.label: Parameter
property.description: {PARAM} to be used in substitution

property.label: Data Conversion
property.description: Specify preprocessing on variables value

property.label: Authentication Method
property.description: Specify the type of SSH Authentication.

property.label: Username
property.description: User that is used for authorization with the host.

property.label: Password
property.description: User's password.

property.label: publicKey passphrase
property.description: The password for the pem-file.

property.label: Key-File
property.description: The keyfile for the ssh-keypair, e.g. C:/.ssh/id_rsa

property.label: Command Lookup
property.description: Il true command is obtained with a lookup in definition file

property.label: Command
property.description: Command which will be executed on the server

property.label: Command Key
property.description: key in lookup table

property.label: Missing Key
property.description: key in lookup table if commandKey doesn't exist

property.label: Command Lookup table
property.description: TSV tab separated file with commands

property.label: Capture Output
property.description: Defines if the output of the executed command should be captured and returned as message.

property.label: output buffer size
property.description: Size of the output buffer

property.label: WS WSDL
property.description: URL to the WSDL file

property.label: WS Operation
property.description: Name of the web service operation

property.label: WS Parameters
property.description: Parameter-name=parameter-value pairs which will be used for substitution of parameters. One pair per line.

property.label: isDotNET
property.description: Is "true" when plugin invokes .NET web service

property.label: WS Use Prefix
property.description: indicator which shows if plugin will add a namespace prefix to child elements in the SOAP request

property.label: Returned Measure Names
property.description: Returned measures contains list of names of measures which are returned by the command in the first line of the command's output

property.label: Metric Prefix
property.description: Prefix in output to find metrics

property.label: Validating column
property.description: The name of the column to use to validate the result, if empty uses the first column.

property.label: Validating rule
property.description: If enabled, the specified rule will be used to check the response.

property.label: Search string
property.description: Enter a case-sensitive string to search for in the retrieved webpage. If 'Success if match' is configured and the webpage contains the string, the measure will yield 1, otherwise 0.

property.label: Regular Expression
property.description: Regulal expression to validate the result

property.label: Bytes
property.description: Enter the number of bytes expected for the response.

property.label: Parse probe data
property.description: Enable parsing of JSON data.

property.label: Mod Status URL
property.description: Enter the URL to mod_status service. Remeber to add ?auto in order to have machine readable data. {host} will be replaced with target host. Example: 'http://{host}/server-status?auto'.

property.label: ElasticSearch Server URL
property.description: Enter the URL to an ElasticSearch Cluster Node. {host} will be replaced with target host. Example: 'http://{host}:9200/'.

property.label: Redis Authotization key
property.description: Port to use to connect to Redis

metric.name: Response Time
metric.description: Complete response time (e.g. connection + query + read)

metric.name: Apache - TotalAccesses
metric.description: Total count of requests to the Apache server.

metric.name: Apache - TotalBytes
metric.description: Total amount of megabytes served by the Apache server.

metric.name: Apache - CPULoad
metric.description: Current CPU load of the Apache server.

metric.name: Apache - Uptime
metric.description: The time the servers has been running in seconds.

metric.name: Apache - BusyWorkers
metric.description: The number of worker serving requests.

metric.name: Apache - WorkersUtilization
metric.description: Shows how utilized the server is, consider increasing the workers thread pool if this reaches 100%. No more connections is accepted by Apache when it reaches 100%.

metric.name: Apache - Scoreboard - Idle cleanup of worker
Apache - Scoreboard - Open Slot
metric.description: Open slot with no current process

metric.name: Oracle - SGA - Buffer Cache Hit Ratio
Oracle - SGA - Execution Without Parse Ratio
Oracle - Hit Ratio - SQL Area Get
Oracle - Hit Ratio - SQL Area Pin
Oracle - Hit Ratio - Library Cache Get
Oracle - Hit Ratio - Library Cache Pin
Oracle - Info - Short Table Scans Ratio
Oracle - Table Contention - Chained Fetch Ratio
Oracle - Table Contention - Free List Contention
ElasticSearch - ActivePrimaryShards
metric.description: The number of primary shards that are used across the cluster

metric.name: ElasticSearch - ActiveShards
metric.description: The number of shards (primary and replica) that are used across the cluster

metric.name: ElasticSearch - ActiveShardsPercent
metric.description: Percentage of shards that are active, a green cluster should have 100% here

metric.name: ElasticSearch - DelayedUnassignedShards
metric.description: The number of shards that are in delayed state

metric.name: ElasticSearch - DeleteCurrent
metric.description: Currently active delete operations per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - DeletedCountPerSecond
metric.description: Derived measure which provides the number of documents deleted per second since the monitor was last run

metric.name: ElasticSearch - DocCountPerSecond
metric.description: Derived measure which provides the number of documents added per second since the monitor was last run

metric.name: ElasticSearch - FetchCurrent
metric.description: Currently active fetch operations per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - FieldDataEvictions
metric.description: How often field data was evicted from the field data cache

metric.name: ElasticSearch - FieldDataSize
metric.description: Size of the field data per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - FileDescriptorCount
metric.description: File descriptor metrics split by different file descriptor measures

metric.name: ElasticSearch - FileDescriptorLimit
metric.description: Allowed number of max file descriptor on the operating system split by node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - FileSystemSize
metric.description: File system metrics split by different file system measures

metric.name: ElasticSearch - IndexingCurrent
metric.description: Currently active indexing operations per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - IndexingThrottleTime
metric.description: Time that indexing was throttled per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - InitHeap
metric.description: The number of bytes currently initialized on the heap per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - InitializingShards
metric.description: The number of shards that are currently initializing

metric.name: ElasticSearch - InitNonHeap
metric.description: The number of bytes currently initialized off-heap per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - MaxDirect
metric.description: The number of bytes of direct memory that can be used per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - MaxHeap
metric.description: The number of bytes of heap-memory that can be used at max per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - MaxNonHeap
metric.description: The number of bytes of off-heap memory that can be used at max per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - PercolateCount
metric.description: Percolate metrics split by different percolate measures

metric.name: ElasticSearch - PercolateSize
metric.description: Size used for percolation per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - QueryCacheSize
metric.description: Size of the query cache per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - QueryCurrent
metric.description: Currently active query operations per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - RecoveryAsSource
metric.description: Number of shards that are recovered from this node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - RecoveryAsTarget
metric.description: Number of shards that are recovered to this node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - RecoveryThrottleTime
metric.description: Time that recovery was throttled per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - RelocatingShards
metric.description: The number of shards that are currently relocated

metric.name: ElasticSearch - ScrollCurrent
metric.description: Currently active scroll operations per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - SegmentSize
metric.description: Size of segments, split by different segment-measures

metric.name: ElasticSearch - ShardCount
metric.description: The number of shards with dynamic splittings by state

metric.name: ElasticSearch - StoreSize
metric.description: Size of storage overall per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - StoreThrottleTime
metric.description: Time that storing was throttled per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - TranslogSize
metric.description: Size of the translog per node

metric.name: ElasticSearch - UnassignedShards
metric.description: The number of shards that are currently uninitialized
